error.message: Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_save_data(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::saveData().
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::delete().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to amp_validator.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
